title: Chattahoochee River National Recreation Area: Pets
body: Pets       Pets In the Park Pets are welcome in Chattahoochee River National Recreation Area - but to protect other visitors, wildlife and your pets themselves, please remember these regulations: Pets are allowed on park trails.   Pets must be leashed (6' or shorter leash) at all times You must clean up your pet's poop. You must dispose of poop in appropriate receptacles or take it home. Pets may not be left unattended. As much as you may enjoy the park sometimes your pets are happier staying at home.
